revision.text:
<!--대륙_정보-->
{{TemplateMapping
| mapToClass = Continent
| mappings =
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 면적 | ontologyProperty = areaTotal | unit = squareKilometre }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 인구 | ontologyProperty = populationTotal }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 밀도 | ontologyProperty = populationDensity | unit = PopulationDensity }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 나라 | ontologyProperty = country }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 속령 | ontologyProperty = demonym }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 언어 | ontologyProperty = language }}
end}}

<!-- Not Yet Mapping
|나라_목록 =
|미승인    =
|언어      = 
|시간대    = 
|인터넷    =
|도시      = 
-->
